greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Infinite square array: T(n,k) = number of directed multigraphs with loops with n arcs and k vertices; read by falling antidiagonals.
comment: Partial sums of the rows of A136564.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1325
R. J. Mathar, Statistics on Small Graphs, arXiv:1709.09000 (2017) Table 79.
program: edges(v,t) = {prod(i=2, #v, prod(j=1, i-1, my(g=gcd(v[i],v[j])); t(v[i]*v[j]/g)^(2*g))) * prod(i=1, #v, t(v[i])^v[i])}
T(n)={Mat(vector(n+1, k, Col(O(y*y^n) + G(k-1, y + O(y*y^n)))))}
results.author: _Benoit Jubin_, May 03 2008
ext: More terms from _Vladeta Jovovic_ and _Benoit Jubin_, Sep 10 2008
